title: The Poem is: An Audio Recording
content:
The poem is
An audio recording
Of a death,
Made with a smart phone,
In the pocket of
A carer,
And Deleted.

title: The Poem is: A Flip Digital Video Camera
content:
The poem is
A Flip digital video camera
From the year
2007,
Held by a child,
Filming his brother,
In the year
2022,
In low res;
An argument,
Now snapped
In two.

title: The Poem is: The Maiden, The Nymph, The Crone
content:
The poem is
The Maiden, typing,
The Nymph, Online,
The Crone, Last seen.

title: The Poem is: Laughing Crying Emoji
content:
The poem is
Laughing Crying Emoji
I want to die!
Removed by user

title: The Poem is: The Salt Packet
content:
The poem is
The salt packet
Wipe packet
Finger lickin'

title: The Poem is: The Digital Ruin
content:
The poem is
The digital ruin
Crumbling

title: The Poem is: A Smartphone Camera
content:
The Poem is
A smartphone camera,
High definition photo
of a rusty telephone box
table, where
Address books
Sat open
Waiting for fingers
To rest on
The numbers
